vclaim: California Gov. Gavin Newsom dined with lobbyists at a Napa Valley restaurant in November 2020 during the COVID pandemic and was photographed without a protective mask while away from the table.
title: Did Gavin Newsom Dine in Napa with Lobbyists During COVID?
subtitle: A picture from a dinner at the posh French Laundry restaurant showed the California governor mask-less while standing away from the table.
author: Jordan Liles
